messenger2.client.transport module¶

class messenger2.client.transport.ClientTransport(ip_address, port, username, password)¶

Bases: threading.Thread, PySide2.QtCore.QObject

Main Transport between client and server. Send all requests and proceed responses

add_contact(username)¶

send request to add new contact to user list

alert_message¶
connect_to_server()¶

try to make a connection with server If auth is wrong close socket

connection_lost¶
del_contact(username)¶

send request to del contact from user list

get_all_contacts()¶

send request to get all users on server

get_answer()¶

read data from socket

get_contacts()¶

send request to get user contacts

get_protocol_from_response(response)¶

get protocol from server response

join_to_server()¶

try to join with server

new_message¶
presence()¶

make presence with server get/send all necessary public keys for encrypting data

proceed_answer()¶

function that proceed response from server

quit()¶

send request that client is closed or quit

run() → None¶

start main transport event

send_alert(msg, send_to, send_from)¶

send alert message to server

send_message(message, username, to)¶

send message to another user
